subject: How to test error handling?
msgSnippet: Hello, Is there any tips to test out error handlers? I have a number of exception handling code, let say they are SQLException. In general those code get poor
messageBody:
Hello,




Is there any tips to test out error handlers? I have a number of
exception handling code, let say they are SQLException. In general
those code get poor coverage. Some are added defensively and is only
invoked in rare siutation. Is there any good way to exercise them?




Wai Yip Tung
